column4: Hi... what difference is there between .mp3 and .ogg   .....any reason to pick one over the other?

mp3 is patent-encumbered while ogg vorbis is not (ogg is just the container), and generally vorbis is considered better quality at the same bitrates, but some portable audio players won't play ogg vorbis
see here for more info http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vorbis
: thx for the details... ill pick ogg then..
